text: The 1972–73 Scottish Inter-District Championship was a rugby union competition for Scotland's district teams.Forsyth's Rugby Record. pub. R. W. Forsyth Princes Street, Edinburgh & Renfield Street, Glasgow. 1972. This season saw the 20th Scottish Inter-District Championship. Edinburgh District and Glasgow District shared the competition with 2 wins and 1 loss.Forsyth's Rugby Record. pub. R. W.
